info.name: auto white-balance
info.description:
Auto normalization of mean level and contrast, per channel.
Meant under Gaussian hypothesis, so would be better without a green screen and so poor content :-)
But should be great for your webcam under varying lighting condition.

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U ) { O = texture(iChannel1,U/iResolution.xy);
     O *= O; }   // sRGB -> RGB
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U ) { O = texture(iChannel0,U/iResolution.xy); \
     O *= O; }   // second RGB moments
renderpass.name: Buffer B
